comments.body: I guess this comment is not applicable to dotty. It might be worth leaving a comment that contrasts the approaches, though.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +5,9 @@  trait X extends Function1[Int, String]
  implicit def f2x(f: Function1[Int, String]): X = ???
  ({case _ if "".isEmpty => ""} : X) // allowed, implicit view used to adapt

  // ({case _ if "".isEmpty => 0} : X) // expected String, found Int
